post_content: Looking to sell my graded Tinker portrait. Piedmont 150 back. Nice clean card and a decent “2”. $SOLDNET and that will include tracked shipping. I have a couple other T206 slabs that I am looking to sell as well……McGraw (finger) SGC 2 I am looking for 160.00; and Wallace PSA 3(MK) I am looking for 160.00. Both of these have common backs. I’m not great at posting pictures, so if you’re interested send me a PM and I’d be happy to email or text you pics. Thanks!
